de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler

Interface TnccsValidationExceptionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTnccsValidationExceptionHandler

    public interface TnccsValidationExceptionHandler
    Generic handler to handle minor message validation exceptions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dump(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
      Forwards a list of of minor validation exceptions but does not allow the handler to send error messages in return.
      List<TnccsMessage> handle(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
      Handles a list of minor validation exceptions and returns a list of error messages if necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        List<TnccsMessage> handle(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
        Handles a list of minor validation exceptions and returns a list of error messages if necessary.
        Parameters:
        exceptions - a list of exceptions
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • dump

        void dump(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
        Forwards a list of of minor validation exceptions but does not allow the handler to send error messages in return.
        Parameters:
        exceptions - a list of exceptions to dump
